state.type: (upper_RS_integral f I fun x => x) = upper_integral f I
(lower_RS_integral f I fun x => x) = lower_integral f I
(RS_integ f I fun x => x) = integ f I
(RS_IntegrableOn f I fun x => x) ↔ IntegrableOn f I
RS_IntegrableOn f (Icc (-1) 1) Real.sign ∧ (RS_integ f (Icc (-1) 1) fun x => -x.sign) = 2 * f 0
